origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoAPI.get_research_articles', 'description': 'This function retrieves research articles related to a specific cryptocurrency based on the given category.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'cryptoCurrency', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The cryptocurrency to search for articles about.'}, {'name': 'articleCount', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of articles to retrieve.'}, {'name': 'category', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The category of articles to retrieve, e.g., financial_connectivity, market_trends.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'A list of research articles.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoAPI.get_research_articles, 它的参数输入如下: 'cryptoCurrency'是'Cosmos', 'articleCount'是'3', 'category'是'financial_connectivity'.
